metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11743 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The init_copy function in kernel.c in mruby 1.4.1 makes initialize_copy calls for TT_ICLASS objects, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (mrb_hash_keys uninitialized pointer and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: mruby: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
